messages.content: I eat pizza every day, could you please give me some advice on healthy eating/

While you enjoy pizza, it's important to prioritize a balanced diet for overall health and well-being.  Your food choices directly impact your current and future health.  The provided text emphasizes the importance of variety and moderation.  Instead of eating the same foods daily, it recommends creating a different meal plan for each day of the week and then rotating those plans on following weeks. This allows for smart decisions and helps ensure a balanced nutrient intake.  Whether you prefer 3 larger meals or 6 smaller meals with snacks, the key is to incorporate healthy foods that positively benefit your body. The text also mentions that moderation is key, suggesting that enjoying treats occasionally is acceptable as part of a balanced approach.
